summary: VBT Tracking 3-Layer Protection System Testing Complete. All 27 unit tests pass (100%). Frontend navigation verified: login -> athlete -> assessments -> VBT Camera page loads correctly. Camera permission screen shown (expected in web preview). Portuguese labels confirmed implemented.
critical_code_review_comments: 3-Layer Protection System implemented correctly in trackingProtection.ts
LAYER 1: HumanPresenceValidator - requires keypoints with score >= 0.6, 5 consecutive valid frames
LAYER 2: TrackingStateMachine - states: noHuman, ready, executing with controlled transitions
LAYER 3: TrackingPointManager - coach must define tracking point before calculations
All Portuguese translations present in vbt-camera.tsx labels object
Critical config preserved: newArchEnabled: true, jsEngine: 'jsc'
useProtectedBarTracking hook integrates all 3 layers with React state management
Simulation mode (useSimulation: true) used for web preview - real pose detection requires native build

success_rate.frontend: 100% - Unit tests pass, UI navigation works, camera permission screen shows correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: VBT 3-Layer Protection System fully tested. Unit tests in /app/frontend/services/vbt/__tests__/trackingProtection.test.ts verify all protection layers. VBT Camera page accessible via: Athletes -> click athlete -> Assessments tab -> Strength & VBT card -> VBT via Camera button. Camera functionality only works on native iOS/Android builds - web preview shows permission request screen.
features_verified: LAYER 1: Human Presence Validation with keypoints score >= 0.6 - VERIFIED via unit tests
LAYER 2: State Machine (noHuman -> ready -> executing) - VERIFIED via unit tests
LAYER 3: Coach-Defined Tracking Point required before calculations - VERIFIED via unit tests
Tracking point selection UI with keypoint options - VERIFIED in code review
Portuguese labels for all UI elements - VERIFIED in vbt-camera.tsx
Protection banner showing state (SEM PESSOA, PRONTO, EXECUTANDO) - VERIFIED in code
Critical config preserved (newArchEnabled: true, jsEngine: 'jsc') - VERIFIED in app.json
Navigation flow to VBT Camera page - VERIFIED via Playwright

mocked_apis_list: Pose detection simulation in useProtectedBarTracking.ts (useSimulation: true)
mocked_api.note: Real MediaPipe pose detection only works in native iOS/Android builds. Web preview uses simulation mode.

test_suites: CAMADA 1: Validação de Presença Humana (6 tests)
